2a1(ji): la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus
2a2(ji): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
2a3(ji): gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la/ khro bo dang khro mo mkha'
2a4(ji): 'gro ma bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/
2b1(ji): bdus na 'dag rten gyi khams 'din drag par gyur ba ru dang / dum drug byed su dang /
2b2(ji): 'khor ma bdun dbang phyug ma dang bcas pa sha dang / khrag dang / rus pa la longs spyod pa'i tshe/ dpal
2b3(ji): rdo rje khrag 'thung dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad pas/ ru dra bsgral ba'i gnas skabs su ru dro'i snying khrag theb
2b4(ji): long tsam gnyis yar po las// ru dra'i sras drag byed ma hA de wA zhes bya ba zhal gsum pa/ phyug
2b5(ji): drug pa/ mtshon cha sna tshogs pa thogs pa/ yum drig mo ral gcig ma zhes bya ba dang / drag mo sring
3a1(ji): @##/ pa 'khor byed ma zhes bya ba gnyis dang ldan te/ de gnyis las sras phyogs bcur dam sri bcu byung
3a2(ji): stetasteng gi phyogs na yab nyi ma 'bar ba gsal/ yum zla ba sgra 'byin ma/ bu pho nyi ma phag gi mgo can dang / bu mo zla ba
3a3(ji): smigs bu'i mgo can gnas/ shar phyogs na dri za pho rgyal ba'i sgra/ dri za mo rgyal ba'i sgra 'byin ma/ bu stag gi mgo can dang /
3a4(ji): bu mo bya rgod kyi mgo can gnas/ shar lho na me lha dbyug pa can/ me lha mo lcags sngar can/ bu g.yag gi mgo can dang /
3a5(ji): bu mo bya rog mgo can gnas/ lho na 'chi bdag gshin rje dang / gshin rje mo sha zan/ bu sha ba'i mgo can dang / bu mo
3a6(ji): 'ug pa'i mgo can gnas/ lho nub na srin po g.yo byed dang / srin mo gtun shing 'dzin ma/ bu gzig gi mgo can dang / bu
3b1(ji): mo khra'i mgo can gnas/ nub phyog sran klu rgyal chu la/ klu mo pri ra la zhon la/ bu byi la'i mgo can dang / bu mo pu shud mgo can gnas/ nub byang na rlung lha gzhan
3b2(ji): 'jems dang / rlung lha mo 'ja' 'dzin ma dang / bu spyang ki'i mgo can dang / bu mo khra'i mgo can gnas/ byang na gnod sbyin las kyi bdud dang / gnod sbyin
3b3(ji): mo rlung lha zhon dang / bu seng ge'i mgo can dang / bu mo pa wang mgo can gnas/ byang shar na 'byung po khams gsum gyi bdag po dang / 'byung mo srog gcod ma
3b4(ji): dang bu dom gyi mgo can dang / bu mo sre mong mgo can gnas/ 'og phyogs na sa bdag stobs 'joms dang / sa bdag mo rlung gi gzugs 'dzin ma dang / sa bdag
3b5(ji): gi bu dred kyi mgo can dang / sa bdag gi bu mo byi la'i mgo can gnas te/ de rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi sems can thams cad kyi srog gcad/ sha zos/ khrag 'thungs//
3b6(ji): dbugs rngubs shing / dam pa'i chos la gnas pa dang / dkar po'i phyogs la gnas pa thams cad kyi dam sri byed cing / bar du gcod par byed par gnas pa la// rgya de'i tshe 'og
3b7(ji): min gyi gnas na/ chos sku skye ba med pa'i ngang las/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rdo rje 'chang yab yum la/ sangs rgyas til gyi gang bu lta bus bskor nas gnas pa la/
4a1(ji): gdul bya drag byed dbang phyug ma hA de wa de gzigs nas/ lho'i 'dzam bu gling gi o D+yan gyi yul gyi dur khrod kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas su/ phyi rin po che/
4a2(ji): sna lnga las grub cing / nang thod pa skam rlon las grub pa'i gzhal yas khang rgya khyon dpag tu med pa sprul pa'i nang du/ dpal rdo rje gzhon nu yab yum gsum me dpung gi dkyil na 'jigs
4a3(ji): shing rngam par bzhugs te gnas rgya de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das bdud thams cad 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsang gnas nas/ khro bo khams
4a4(ji): gsum rnam par rgyal ba byung nas/ khams gsum gyi bdud thams cad dang / dam sri bcu'i ya ba yum rnams dbang du bsdus nas mdun du bkug nas/ khro bo de slar gsang gnas su thim mo//
4a5(ji): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsang gnas dang / spyan gnyis dang / spyi bo tshangs pa'i bu ga nas sgo ma bzhi byung ste/ lcags kyu ma sa dam sri bcu'i snying nas bzung / zhags pa mas
4a6(ji): bcings/ lcags sgrog mas bsdams/ dril bums myos par byas te/ dpal chen po ya ba yum gyi mkha' gsang bar nas sras kyi mchog byung ste/ bgegs kyi tshogs de rnams
4a7(ji): kyi klad pa phyogs bcur tshal pa brgya/ lus dum bu stong / slang tshal pa bdun du gtubs nas srog ye shes su bsgyur/ yab yum gyi mkha' gsang nas 'od kyi gong bu bcu las/
4b1(ji): khro mo yab yum khra thabs dang bcas pa phyogs bcur sprul nas/ dam sri bcu gdan du byas te/ de'i tshe sems can thams cad sdug bsngal dang bral zhing // bdud bzhi rang zhir song ngo /
4b2(ji): sprul pa'i sku de nyid snang ba'i dus na/ byang shar gyi khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba rig pa'i rgyal po bye ba khrag khrig dang / ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma dpag tu med pa dang
4b3(ji): bcas pas/ sha dang / rus pa dang / khrag dron mo rnams bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la phul nas/ phyag dang bskor ba lan du ma byas te/ khro bo khams gsum rnam
4b4(ji): par rgyal bas gsol pa/ e ma ho/ rigs pa'i ye shes 'khor 'das gzhi// rtogs na bla med dbyings kyi ngang / ma rtogs 'khor ba nyid du 'khor// de bas thogs med
4b5(ji): kun 'gro bas// nam mkha' bzhin du brtag dka' bas// 'khor ba'i 'dam las thar pa'i thabs// bdag dang gzhan la sman slad du// don dam dbyings kyi thig le las//
4b6(ji): 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang nyid du// yang dag don gyi mthu 'byin pa'i// gsang ba las kyang ches gsang ba// gsang chen rgyud 'di bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol pa dang //
4b7(ji): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// legs par nyon cig khams gsum rgyal// dbyings la skye 'gags mi gnas kyang // 'on kyang 'khor ba las mthar phyin// dri mas
5a1(ji): dri ma dag byud cing // dug gis dug ni zhi bar byed// zhe sdang drag po rgyus pa la// yang dag dbyer med don dang ldan// zhe sdang rdo rje rgyud 'di nyon//
5a2(ji): zhes bka' stsal to// dpal rdo rje gzhon nu thugs rje khros pa'i rgyud kyi bshad pa las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas khams gsum
5a3(ji): rnam par rgyal bas gsol pa/ bdud rnams 'dul ba'i bcom ldan 'das// zhe sdang can gyi gang zag rnams// rdo rje rigs su smin pa'i thabs// rim pa ji ltar bshad du gsol//
5a4(ji): bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa// rdo rje rigs kyi srog la yang // 'bum phrag gcig tu nges bzlas pas// lha yi lung ni bstan pa dang // sa brtag dkyil 'khor drag por
5a5(ji): sbyang / rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ni// gru gsum gru bzhi mthing nag ldan// ma dang bsgral zhing bdud rtsi lnga// dur khrod rdzas kyis byug par bya// oM pany+tsa a mr-i ta maN+Dal hu/
5a6(ji): oM rak+ta maN+Da la hUM/ oM na maHsa man+ta maN+Da la hUM/ oM keng ka pA la maN+Da la hUM/ ba yi rnam lnga rang bzhin te// lha yi gnas su me tog ni// tshom bu sngon po lha grangs dgod// bdud
5a7(ji): rtsi lnga yi thig le dgod// phun sum tshogs pa lnga ldan pas// dkyil 'khor lha la gsol ba gdab// bla ma rdo rje slob dpon gyis// slob ma dag la byin gyis brlabs//
5b1(ji): oM a hUM badz+ra sa taH/ hUMHstong gsum stong gi 'jig rtenan// 'gro ba rigs drug sems can rnams// dug lnga nyon mongs tshar gcad phyir// rigs lnga khrag 'thung
5b2(ji): nyid du brjod// A 'gro ba rigs lnga gas la bu 'di// rtogs 'joms ye shes lnga rang bzhin// ye nus skye sring chos skul// snang ba 'khrul pa snying riH/
5b3(ji): badz+ra thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin te// cis kyang mi chod mi shig cing // skye 'gag med pa rdo rje'i dang // don dom nyid du rnam par dag/ swA dbyings las ngo drom
5b4(ji): grub kyang / snang ba tsam du khrag 'thung sku// dug lnga rtsad nas gcang ba'i phyir// rigs lnga'i khro bo rnam par dag/ rigs lnga khro bo bsgrub pa la// snying rje
5b5(ji): sems can la bskyed nas// thar pa 'dod pa'i bsam pa yis// dam tshig lnga po gzung bar gyis// 'di yis myur du sgrol bar nges// hUM thams cad mkhyen
5b6(ji): pa'i bcom ldan 'das// rigs lnga 'dul ba'i khro rgyal tshogs// rdo rje gzhon nu khros pa'i dpal// skal ldan rnams kyis thob par shog/ slob dpon rigs drug
5b7(ji): rdo rje 'chang // oM gtsug tor sangs rgyas khrag 'thung dpal// badz+ra lag g.yas rdo rje khrag 'thung dpal// sa lag g.yon rin chen khrag 'thung dpal
6a1(ji): tA/ rkang g.yas las kyi khrag 'thung dpal// a rkang g.yon pad+ma khrag 'thung dpal// hUM thugs kha gsal ba'i
6a2(ji): dkyil 'khor nyid// lus kyi dkyil 'khor 'di yin no// mthong ba sa rigs lnga khrag 'thung sku// bshags pas lus ngag dag par byed// oM aHbadz+ra
6a3(ji): satwa hUMHoM/ ye shes lnga ldan bla ma rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje rigs kyi lha tshogs dgongs su gsol// khrag 'thung khro bo khro mos byin gyis brlabs// bdag gi
6a4(ji): lus kyis srog bcad ma byin blangs// mi gtsang spyod cing ting 'dzin skum gsal// sku yi dam tshig nyams pa 'thol lo bshag sa// A bdag gi ngag gis
6a5(ji): rdzun dang phra ma dang // ngag 'khyal tshig rtsub bzlas brjod grangs ma stsol// rdo rje bzlas pa'i don ni bdag gis ma rtogs te// gsung gi dam tshig nyams te 'thol lo
6a6(ji): bshags// badz+ra/ bdag gis snod ldan sems can thams cad la// brna ba sems gnod sems log lta skyes pa dang // chos nyid zab mo'i don ni ma
6a7(ji): rtogs te// lta ba sangs rgyas thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa bshags// sa/ sems can thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas rgyu// ma rtogs bdag gis mngan dang skyon
6b1(ji): du bslangs// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas ma brjod cing // yon tan dam tshig nyams te 'thol lo bshags// tA sangs rgyas 'phrin las sna tshogs dpag med
6b2(ji): kyis/ snying rje chen pos sems can don ma byas// bdud rtsi lnga la longs spyod mi nus shing // 'phrin las dam tshig nyams pa 'thol lo bshags// hUMskye ba rnam
6b3(ji): ba'is bsdus pa'i sems can rnams// chos sku rnam dag dbyings nas gzugs skur snang // bde ba chen po kun la khyab dmigs te// yang dag don dam ma rtogs 'thol lo/
6b4(ji): bshags// bla ma rdo rje 'dzin mchod cing // skyabs 'gro sems bskyed gzhan don dmigs// bla ma rdo rje 'dzin sogs dang // mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams dgongs su
6b5(ji): gsol/ oM chos sku mkha' 'dra gzugs sku 'ja' ltar snang // AHgsang sngags sgra brlan lta bur sgra grags shing // hUM/ khro bo khro mo gdug pa 'dul// bla ma
6b6(ji): med dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi// oM/ bdag gi byang chub mchog gi sems// a/ ma lus pa ni bskyed par bgyi// badz+ra ngan song gsum las ma grol ba/
6b7(ji): lhami gnyis su grol bar bgyi// sa ma bskal ba yi lha mi rnams// byang chub sa la bskal bar bgyi// twa/ dbugs ma phyung ba'i byang chub sems// sa brgyad pa la dbugs
7a1(ji): dbyungs zhing // hUM sems la mya ngan 'das pa'i mtha'// rdo rje 'chang la rab tu dgod// lan gsum brgyud la gnas par 'gyur// bsrung
7a2(ji): ba so shing basbyor ba'i chu// ku sha'i sngas stan steng du ni// dur khrod zhing lpags stengs nya la rmi lam rtag/ 'grub pa'i rtags rnams rab tu dbyung // bum pa mthing shun sngon po'i
7a3(ji): mdog/ gsang zhing dur khrod ras kyis dkri// ljon shing bzang pos kha brgyan cing // bdud rtsi lnga yis bum pa dgang // dbang dang bdud sel bgegs bsal ba'i//
7a4(ji): bum pa gsum du yang dag nges// rdo rje gzhon nu rigs kyi lha// ye shes khro bo thugs bskul sngags// lha yi sngags rnams rab tu bzlas// khri dang stong gi dngos grub 'byung //
7a5(ji): rtags byung nyi ma rtse shar la// rgyu ni rigs lnga khrag 'thung dpal// mi 'gyur thig gis legs par btab// dur khrod tshon rtsi sna lnga yis// dkyil 'khor rdo rje rigs su nges//
7a6(ji): rdzas rnams phun sum tshogs ldan pas// lha rnams bsgrub pa tshul bzhin bya// slob ma'i bdud dang bgegs bsal te// yon ni khams ni len du gzhug/ hUM/ khrag
7a7(ji): 'thung rdo rje he ru ka/ bdag gi bdud rtsi lngas mchod de// bdag ni rab tu bsgral slad du// mi phyed rdo rje bdag la stsol// slob mas lan gsum legs brjod pas// bla ma rdo rje
7b1(ji): slob dpon gyis// slob ma bzang la 'di skad du rjod// hUM/ skal ldan rigs 'dzin rigs kyi bu// lhag pa'i bsam pa bzang po'i phyir// da lta'i dus na sems bskyed
7b2(ji): nas// bu khyod dga' ba ci la dga'// mtshan ldan slob mas 'di brjod do// hUM/ bdag ni skal bzang bde chen la// bde chen mchog la bdag dga' ste// bla med byang chub
7b3(ji): thob bya'i phyir// khrag 'thung dpal la bdag dga' 'o// skal ldan de la dam tshig dbog/ hUM sangs rgyas kun gyi 'grub pa'i gzhi// bla med rdo rje dam tshig ste// dam pa
7b4(ji): 'di ni gzung bar bgyi// bla ma rdo rje slob dpon dang // dkon mchog mkha' gro ma yang gzung // phyag rgya sngags rnams rgyun mi gcad// yang dag lam du zhugs la byams//
7b5(ji): gsang ba chen po sgra mi bya// 'di la rtsa ba lnga rnams gzung // bsgrub dang bsrung ba'i dam tshig mchog/ zhe sdang gti mug 'dod chags nga rgyal// dkar dmar ljang ser mthing ka'i mdog/
7b6(ji): dag pa'i snod bcud mi dor ro// yan lag bcu yi dam tshig ste// bdag gi brtan par gzung bar bgyi// nam du yang ni mi spang ngo // lan gsum rgyud la gnas par 'gyur//
7b7(ji): rdo rje dam tshig mna' bsgag ste// oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM hri thaHme tog sngon po sna tshogs lta// hUM/ dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'dir// rdo rje rigs kyi me tog dor nas kyang /
8a1(ji): khrag 'thung rdo rje rigs kyi lha tshogs kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub rab 'byams rnams// skal ldan rigs 'dzin bdag la stsal du gsol/
8a2(ji): bdag ni rdo rje rigs su gzung du gsol// oM bo d+ha tsit+ta pU dza ho/ bla ma rdo rje slob dpon gyis// lha ngo bstan cing cod pan sbyin// dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du//
8a3(ji): byang chub rdo rje'i lam nas drangs nas kyang // khrag 'thung rdo rje rigs kyi lha tshogs kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub rab 'byams rnams// skal ldan rigs 'dzin khyod la sbyin par
8a4(ji): bya/ drag po lha tshogs khyod kyis lta bar byos// puSh+pa a be sha a a/ gang gi slob ma dbang bskur phyir// bum pa rdo rje dril bu dang // thod pa rdo rje ming du grags// phur
8a5(ji): pa khro bcu dpa' bo'i tshul// gsang sngags 'chi med 'dod yon che// oM bo d+hi tsid+d+ha sa ma ya sta/ a b+hi Shiny+tsA a/ nus pa skyed par byed pa yi// rdo rje nang gi dbang lnga ste/
8a6(ji): thos bsgom smra byed 'phrin las dbang // rdo rje slob dpon dpa' bo che// yab yum bde ba sbyor ba'i sgras// byang sems dkar dmar thig le dbang // sa/ nyan byed rna ba'i gzhal
8a7(ji): yas su/ gsal ba rin chen ngo bo nyid// sa yi phyag rgya tshogs mchog las// rin chen khrag 'thung gsal 'phro bstim// sa dbang de bskur zhing smin pa yis//
8b1(ji): gsang ba'i dbang mchog dam pa las// gsang pa gzhan las bsnyen par bya// gsang ba'i don nyid rtogs par bya// gsang ba gzhan du sgra mi bya// badz+rabasam
8b2(ji): byed snying gi gzhal yas su// gsang ba rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid// yi ge 'phreng ba'i tshogs mchog las// rdo rje khrag 'thung gsal 'phro bstim// badz+ra dus gsum rgyal
8b3(ji): ba'i sras chen po// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje gdan// rgyal ba thams cad mnyes mchod la// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par sbyor// tra/ lag mthil ginyis kyi
8b4(ji): gzhal yas su// gsal ba'i rgya gram ngo bo nyid// tA yi phyag rgya tshogs mchog las// las kyi khrag 'thung gsal 'phro bstim// twa/ khyod kyi rdo rje las yin pas//
8b5(ji): las rnams ma lus kun gyis shig/ pho nya 'du 'phro mang po kun// khyod kyis dgos pa byed par 'gyur// aHsmra byed lce yi gzhal yas su// gsal pa a yi ngo
8b6(ji): po nyid// a yi phyag rgya tshogs mchog las// pad+ma khrag 'thung gsal 'phro bstim// a/ chos kyi bdud rtsi bla na med// dad ldan skyes bu ngoms par byos// rab
8b7(ji): 'bring tha ma'i blo can la// 'thung bar gsang bsgrags gzhan du min// oM bskyed chen yan lag gzhal yas su// gsal ba oM gyi ngo bo nyid// oM a badz+ra satwa hUM
9a1(ji): las rigs lnga khrag 'thung lnga rugs la// oM phyogs bcu dus gsum thams cad kyis// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje che// dkyil
9a2(ji): 'khor kun gyi sbyin pa spyod// dkyil 'khor kun gyi mnga' bdag 'gyur// oM slob ma'i lus ni dag cing smin// rdo rje'i lus ni rnam par dag/ de ni bum pa'i dbang yin
9a3(ji): te/ lha'i mu ni rnam dag pas// myur du thob ste the tshom med// rdo rje theg pa'i mos pa yi// bu mo mtshan padang ldan pa bcwa lnga// thabs ni rdo rje gzhon nu ste// de nyid shes
9a4(ji): rab bde bas lum// rdo rje la ma nas pad+mor 'khyil// bde bathugs kyi thig le sngo// oM a nu ra ga pUng ho/ zag med nyi za'i snying po de// slong ma'i ngag la yang dag sbyin/
9a5(ji): ka ya sid+d+hi ai/ wA kA sid+d+hi AHtsit+ta sid+d+hi hUM/ oM AHhUM/ ma hA pu kha ho/ hUM/ bde chen thig le ya ba yu ma bcu// rdo rje lam nas pad+mor 'khyil// pu yi lce la gzhag
9a6(ji): par bya/ snying gi dkyil du gzung bar bgyis// oM bo d+hi tsit+ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ gsang ba byang sems rdo rje'i ngag/ rdo rje gsum ni rnam par dag/ rdo rje gzhon nu khrag 'thung
9a7(ji): dpal/ shes rab bcu drug len pa yi// bu mo mtshan dang ldan pa la// gar dang ldan pas yang dag bskyod// bde chen sgyu ma'i brda mtshon te// gnyis shor gnyis
9b1(ji): mnyam dbus dag tu// dbyings kyi bde chen byung ba de// rang rig ye shes de la yod// hUM/ bde ba thugs kyi sems dpa' che// yab yum gnyis med mu tig gi
9b2(ji): khu 'phang byang sems phab pa yis// dus gsum bla ma sangs rgyas dang // mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la bde chen gyis// byang chub sems kyi mchod pa phul// rdo rje bde chen thig
9b3(ji): le dbyings// zag med dbyings su mi rtog skye// de bas blo mchog longs spyod cig/ hUM/ ya ba chen chos kyi dbyings mthong ba'i// pad+ma dag las 'o byed dam// de las
9b4(ji): byang chub sems 'khyil ba'i// zag med bde ba longs spyod dam// e ma ho/ shes rab lha mo yum chen mo// chos kyi dbyings 'thoba'o byed dam// byang chub sems mthong
9b5(ji): thig le la// rtag tu gus shing bde bar sbyor// ho oM AHbadz+ra sa ta hUM/ de yis shes rab ye shes kyis// dbang gi rdo rje thugs nyid bdag/ rdo rje sems dpa'i byin rlabs
9b6(ji): kyis// sems nyid mkha' dang mtshungs par mthong // chos sku mngon sum mthong ba'i tshe// mchog gi dbang du de nyid nges// rdul tshon lus dang byang chub sems// de bzhin
9b7(ji): nyid kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ brten nas dbang rnams yang dag bskur// bum pa gsang ba shes rab dbang // bzhi pa mchog gi dbang chen yin// bla ma mnyes par ma byas
10a1(ji): shing / dbang gis smin par ma byas na// thos bsam bsgom pa don med 'gyur// de bas dbang bskur mchog thob kyis// bla ma mnyes
10a2(ji): pas don 'grub 'byung // dam tshig nyams par gyur pa na// bla ma mnyes par byas pas bskor sa// gong bzhin dam tshig gsungs pa dag/ dam tshig dang po yin par
10a3(ji): brjod/ bdud rtsi lnga la longs spyod cing // de ni bu ga'i snying po gzhi ba// dam tshig gnyis pa yin par nges// shes rab rang bzhin bud med la// rigs lnga'i
10a4(ji): mkha' 'gro nyid du rtogs// mdog dang bskyod pa ri mo dang // dri dang pad+ma yongs brtags lnga// gus pas brten cing brtse bar bya// dam tshig gsum pa yin par nges
10a5(ji): ting 'dzin gsum ldan nges pa yis// sems can sangs rgyas dbyer med kyang // nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam par dmigs// nam yang 'bral bar mi byed par// dam tshig
10a6(ji): bzhi pa yin par bshad// badz+ra/ gsang gsum dam tshig las byung ba// yab yum gnyis med bde chen las// byang chub sems kyi chu rgyun 'dis// rdo rje rigs kyi
10a7(ji): dbang bskur ro// oM bo d+hi tsit+ta a ta ri sha dz+nyA na badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ sa sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal srid che// thob pa lnga yi dbang bskur bas// rin chen rigs kyi dbang bskur
10b1(ji): mchog/ rin chen khrag 'thung bstan gyur cig/ sa man+ta rat+na badz+ra a gri Shi maM/ AHsangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje dbang // rdo rje gsung gi don mdzad pa// pad+ma khrag 'thung rdo
10b2(ji): rje dpal// rdo rje chos kyi dbang bskur ro// badz+ra a b+hiShiny+tsa maM/ pra ta pra be sha dz+nyA na a b+hi Shany+tsa maM/ mkha' 'gro kun gyi dril bu'i dbang // rtog med chos kyi sba 'byin zhing //
10b3(ji): las kyi khrag 'thung 'phrin las bdag/ shes rab dril bus dbang bskur ro// tiSh+Tha a nud+d+hA na badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mA/ oM rdo rje ming gi chos nyid de// cis kyang mi tshugs mi shigs
10b4(ji): te/ sangs rgyas khrag 'thung ngo bo nyid// rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ro// d+harma d+ha tu bi shod+ha/ badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ thams cad 'dus pa'i ye shes la// drug pa rdo rje gzhon
10b5(ji): nu'i sku/ zla ba drug gis nges par 'grub// lha klu thams cad dbang bsdus cing // mkha' 'gro'i gnas su myur du 'gro// dpal rdo rje gzhon nu thugs rje khros pa rtsa ba'i
10b6(ji): rgyud kyi bshad pa las dbang gi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas rnam rgyal khro bo yis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma
10b7(ji): bcom ldan khro bo'i gtso// sems kyi zhe sdang 'dul ba'i phyir// rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rdzas// lha yi de nyid bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
11a1(ji): stsal pa/ gnas dang dkyil 'khor phur pa dang // sku yi sku mdog phyag mtshan rnams// nga yis bshad kyis legs par nyon//
11a2(ji): rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub pa'i gnas// dur khrod chen po rab 'jigs dang // ri dang brag dang sa yi dbyibs// rigs kyi mtshan mar nges pa dang // nyams dga' ba
11a3(ji): yi sa phyogs su// gnag cing tsher rtsub sa btsal la// rdo rje dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa// gru bzhi mnyam zhing 'thas par gzhag/ 'byung chen rab 'jigs ru dra
11a4(ji): bsgral dur khrod dkyil 'khor bzhi yin no// rdo rje thod pa mtshan ldan la// thig btab dur khrod tshon gyis bri// lcags sam seng ldeng rtsub pa'i shing // drag
11a5(ji): po'i phur pa sor brgyad pa// ye shes lnga yi bsnyen pa tsam// dur khrod thag tshon rab ldan pas// 'khor lo rtsa bas brgyad rab bris te// phu ra pa'i dbyibs la
11a6(ji): khro bor rdzogs// ting 'dzin rdzogs pas bsnyen pa tsam// gru gsum shel gyi dkyil 'khor ni// nyi shu rtsa gcig rab tu bri// phur pa lha yi bsgrub pa tsam/
11a7(ji): dur khrod thig tshon rab ldan pas// drag po'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum ni// drag po'i phur pas las la sbyar// dkyil 'khor bzhi yis las bzhi 'grub// rdo rje phur
11b1(ji): pa'i bsam gtan gran sa// khams gsum sems can bskal gyur nas// bsad pa 'di yis mchog thob cing // rdo rje rigs gsum mngon sangs rgyas// ting 'dzin
11b2(ji): dkyil 'khor rgyu gnyis kyi// mdzes shing 'jigs par rab tu gnas// phyi ni rin chen lnga las grub// dbus su nor bu bai DUR+Ya// sha ra ni shel yin lho ni gser//
11b3(ji): nu pa ni pad+ma rA ga la// byang ni in+d+ra ni lar gnas// rin chen lnga yi rtsig pas mdzes// 'dod yon lha mo rin chen brdar// me trog 'phreng ba mu tigra ha ra// tA ra Na zhing 'khor
11b4(ji): lo gdugs// ba dan la sogs rab tu mdzes// tog ni rdo rje rtse dgu pa'o// nang ni dur khrod gzhal yas khang // klu chen brgyad kyi ka ba la// nyi ma zla ba lha yi bu sa//
11b5(ji): ka gdan ka zhu mdzes par gnas// lha chen brgyad kyi gdung la ni// zla ba'i skar khung yang dag gnas// gza' chen brgyad kyi phya ma la ni// nyi ma'i mthongs khung bcu
11b6(ji): yis mdzes// nyi shu rtsa brgyad rgyu skar gyis// gral ma rnams su rab tu mdzes// thod pa skam rlon ras ris kyis// phyogs bzhi rtsig pa rab tu byas// 'byung po
11b7(ji): bsnol ba'i mthem byas// chu srin ya them nyid du gnas// ro lon logs kyi skyes bu la// rigs bzhi klu yis sgo bzhi mdzes// dbus kyi gru gsum mthing nag la// /
12a1(ji): zla gam dmar po gsum dang ldan// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad nag por gnas// dur khrod brgyad du gnas pa ste// mtsho dang klu dang sprin dang ni//
12a2(ji): zhing skyong phyogs skyong mchod rten dang // brag dang me yi rnam par gnas// ro ni rlon pa'i ras ris dang // kenga? rus bram rul rnam par 'thor// bya gcan 'jigs pa'i ma
12a3(ji): mo dang / srid pa'i mkha' 'gro mang po gnas// gzhal ya sa mdzes shing 'jigs pa der// lha ni brgyad dang nyi shu gnyis// dbus su drug pa rdo rje 'dzin// ru dra ba snol
12a4(ji): ba'i gdan stengs na// pad+ma nyi zla bdud bzhi mnan// dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu ni// skegs dpa' ba gar dgu pa// rab 'jigs me dpung dkyil na bzhugs// zhal gsum
12a5(ji): pa la phyag drug mdzes// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor stabs bgrad// zhabs gnyis brkyang bsku ma tshul du bzhugs// skra brdzes bzhad khro gshe ba'i zhal// spyan dmar smin ma
12a6(ji): sla ra ser// khro gnyer chu yi rlabs bzhin 'khrug/ phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po yis// gser gyi rdo rje rtse dgu bsnams// bar pa rdo rje rtse lnga bsnams// g.yon gyi dang po me dpung
12a7(ji): bsnams// bar pa kha T+wAM rtse gsum bsnams// mtha' gnyis ri rab phur pa 'dril// mthing nag sku la dur khrod brgyad// rigs lnga thod pa lnga yis brgyan// klu chen brgyad
12b1(ji): dang thod pas brgyan// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs bde ba'i yum// zhal gcig phyag gnyis bde ba'i sku// sbrul dang thod pa gzig gis brgyan// dril bu thod khrag phyag
12b2(ji): bsnams// e ka dza ti sgrol ba'i yum// gri gug thod khrag khams gsum sgrol// res 'ga'o kha cu rtse gsum bsnams// g.yer kha dril bu nyid la yang // rtog med
12b3(ji): chos kyi sgra 'byin ma// ma mo bcu drug po nyar 'gyed// yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba'i sras// stod ni gtso bo yab 'dra la// smad ni chu srin phur bu dpal// rdo rje phur pa dgra bgegs
12b4(ji): sgrol/ de nas phyogs skyong tshar gcad phyir// 'od kyi gong bu slong bcu// yab yum khra thabs nyi shur bcas// steng phyogs nyi rma'i gdan stengs su// khro bo rdo rje tu mdzad dang //
12b5(ji): yum chen rdo rje sgra 'byin ma// sprul pa phag dang smigs bu'i mgo/ shar phyogs dri za'i gdan stengs su// khro bo rdo rje rnam par rgyal// yum chen rdo rje snyems ma dang // sprul pa
12b6(ji): stag dang bya rgod mgo/ shar lho mi lha'i gdan stengs su// khro bo rdo rje dbyug sngon can// yum chen rdo rje rjer mo can// sprul pa g.yag dang bya 'og mgo/ lho phyogs gshin rje'i
12b7(ji): gdan stengs su// khro bo rdo rje gshin rje gshed// yum chen dur khrod bdag mo dang // sprul pa sha ba 'ug pa'i mgo/ lho nub srin po'i gdan stengs su// khro bo chen po mi g.yo mgon//
13a1(ji): yum chen rdo rje gtun khung ma// sprul pa gzig dang khra yi mgo/ nub phyogs klu yi gdan stengs su// khro bo chen po rta mgrin rgyal// yum chen rdo/
13a2(ji): rjeg tu ma mo dang // sprul pa byi la pu shud mgo/ nub byang rlung lha'i gdan stengs su// khro bo chen po gzhan mi thu ba// yum chen rdo rje mda' snye ma sa ma// sprul pa spyang khu khra yi
13a3(ji): mgo/ byang phyogs gnod sbyin gdan stengs su// khro bo rdo rje bdud rtsi 'khyil// yum chen rdo rje rlung 'byin ma// sprul pa pha wa seng ge'i mgo/ byang shar 'byung po'i gdan stangs su//
13a4(ji): khro bo rdo rje khams gsum rgyal// yum chen rdo rje gsod byed ma// sprul pa dom dang sre mong mgo/ 'og phyogs sa bdag gdan stengs su// khro bo rdo rje stobs po che// yum chen rdo rje
13a5(ji): bskyod ma dang // sprul pa dred dang byi li'i mgo/ lhan bzhi bcu 'di rnams kyang // zhal gcig phyag gnyis mdog nag gzugs// stag dang gzig gi sha ma thabs can// mche
13a6(ji): pab can dang gshog pa can// 'phra men mgo gnyen nyi shu ni// sbrul dang thod pas rab tu brgyan// phur pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams// smra brdzas spyan dmar mche ba gtsigs//
13a7(ji): dus mtha'i 'od zer dra bas 'khrug/ drod gsher las skyes sgom bzhi// shar phyogs dri za'i gdan stengs su// skya ka'i mgo can lcags kyu ma// lho phyogs grul bu ma gdan stengs su//
13b1(ji): pu shud mgo can zhags pa ma// nub phyogs chu bdag gdan stengs su// srin bya'i mgo can lcags sgrog ma// byang phyogs gnod sbyin gdan stengs su// khra yi mgo can dril bu
13b2(ji): ma/ 'di bzhi zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// dkar ser dmar dang ldang ba'i mdog/ gzig dang thod sbrul rgyan du byas// bskum zhing brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis mnan// phyag g.yon
13b3(ji): phur pa 'debs par mdzad// me dpung dkyil na khro tshul bzhugs// lha ni brgyad dang bzhi bcu rnams// drag po'i tshul gyis zhe sdang 'joms// 'di yis lus ngag sems sbyangs
13b4(ji): te/ bdud kyi 'tshe bzhi pa dang // tshe 'di nyid la bud+d+ha 'gyur// dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu thugs rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa las/ dkyil 'khor lha'i le'u ste gsum
13b5(ji): pa'o// // de nas rnam rgyal khro bo yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol// e ma ho bcom ldan rig pa'i gtso// dug lnga rtsad nas gcad pa'i
13b6(ji): phyir/ rdo rje khrag 'thung khro tshogs kyi// mngon rtogs rim pa bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gdug 'joms ye shes lnga ldan 'di// nga yis
13b7(ji): bshad kyis legs par nyon// dang po bdud bzhi log 'dren tshogs// tshar gcang bsrung bar rab tu bya// sems bskyed gzhan la rab dmigs la// oM ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra sa b+hAH
14a1(ji): At+ma ka&6/ nam mkha' rdo rje ting 'dzin gnas// rdzus skyes gtso 'khor khro bo ni// skad cig tsam la rab tu gsal// skra yi rkyen gyis yongs su rdzogs//
14a2(ji): hUM/ nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren tshogs// nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed// rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' las ni// sdig can gang zhig 'da' byed pa// stobs chen khro bo chen
14a3(ji): po yis/ klad pa tshal pa brgya ru khos// lus kyang dum bu stong du gtubs// snying yang tshal pa bdun du gtubs// drag po sngags kyis tshar bcad do// oM AHbadz+ra sa ta hUM/
14a4(ji): nyi shu rtsa gcig nyams pa bskang // phyi nang gsang bar rab tu brjod// mtshan ldan rdo rje ka pA la ra// bdud rtsi lnga dang rag ti'i tshogs// sha khrag rus pa gtor mar bshams//
14a5(ji): oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta hUM hri thAH/ oM AHhUM/ ma hA rak+ta dz+wa la muny+tsa hUM/ oM AHhUM/ ba ling ta te tso ba ling ta ba la pa te gu h+ya sa ma ya hUM/ sngags kyi sgra yi sa dag pa gsum/
14a6(ji): mchod rdzas rang bzhin dug lnga dang // dug gsum mchod pa bla na med// hUM/ rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang gcod// mtshon cha sngon po 'bar ba yis// nam mkha'i dkyil nas shar ba 'dra//
14a7(ji): srog gi sgo ru shar ba dang // gling gi sgo ru bsgom par bya// hUM e yai ra suM ke re hUM/ b+hU bi sha bi shud+d+he/ dz+nyA na tsakra maN+Da la b+hUM/ srog las nam mkha' gru gsum dang // rlung
14b1(ji): khrag sha chen keng rus me// 'jigs pa'i dur khrod gzhal yas khang // sgra yi rkyen gyis rab tu rdzogs// dza hUM baM hoHti ra baM/ a ma pa las rdzogs pa'i gdan// ru dra
14b2(ji): pho mo dam sri bcu// bdud bzhi bgegs bzhi yab yum rnams// kha srub gan rgyal byi chings mnan// pad+ma nyi zla yon tan smras// rab bskyed 'od zer rab tu
14b3(ji): 'khrug/ hUM ts+tsha gdug pa 'joms byed rdzogs// oM uHbadz+ra satwa hUM/ rdo rje sems dpa' yab yu min// mtshan dang dpe byad yang dag rdzogs// rdo rje dril bu
14b4(ji): bde par 'khyud// kun+da lta bur da ka ra ba'i ma dog/ rig sa lnga khrag 'thung ya ba yu ma bcu// 'das pa'i rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku// oM badz+ra ki li kI la ya tiSh+Tha tsa kra ha na ha na
14b5(ji): ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ zhes khrag 'thung rgyal po dang // bde bar sgrol bar byed pa'i yu ma// khro zhing rngam pa'i tshul bskyed pa sa// gdug pa ma lus sgrol bar byed//
14b6(ji): hUM snying rjes sgrol ba'i dam tshig ni// bsad cing mnan pa ma yin te// phung po rdo rje gtam byas nas// rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom// srog gi sgo ru shar ba dang /
14b7(ji): snying gi sgo ru bsgom par bya// sgra yi stobs kyis gsal bar bsgom// yab yum mkha' gsang byin gyis brlabs// a dang hUM las rab tu sbyangs// yum gyis yab
15a1(ji): kyi lce gzhi bsra nas// yum gyi thugs kar ut+pal gtad// gdung ba'i nga ro 'di skad brjod// hUM/ rdo rje gzhon nu rigs 'dzin
15a2(ji): rnams/ srid pa rdo rje grub mdzod cig/ srid pa rdo rje phur pa'i lha// ye shes khro bo grub par mdzod// sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes brjod pas// yab yum bde
15a3(ji): bas sgo nga bcu// phyung ste phyogs bcur rab tu spro// oM badz+ra kro d+ha tsu ka ra tsu/ garma hu~M phaT/ gardza hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha bi dza ya hUM/ ha na hUM phaT/ ha na hUM phaT
15a4(ji): oM badz+ra kro d+ha ni la dan+ta hU~M/ da ha hUM phaT/ da ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya mAn ta ka hUM phaT/ pa tsa huM phaT/ pa tsa hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ar+yA a tsa la tsa b+h+yo hUM phaT/ ban+d+ha hUM
15a5(ji): phaHban d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya gri ba hri/ hu lu hUM phaT/ hu lu hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a pA ra tsit+ta hUM phaT/ tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha
15a6(ji): a mr-i ta kuN+Da li tsU/ tshin+ta dz+ya paH/ tshin+di hUM paH/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya hUM phaH/ bin+na hUM phaT/ ban+d+ha hUM phaH/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hUM/ swoHhUM phaT/
15a7(ji): hUM phaT/ yab kyi de brjod sgra stobs kyis// khro bo yab yum mgo brnyan tshogs// lha ni bzhi bcu tham pa bskyed// nyi zla yi ge bzhi nyid las// oM badz+ra kI li ki la bi
15b1(ji): d+ha ya bing bing hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ki li kI la ya na maHsarba ta tha sring hring hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ki li kI la ya su ru su ru pra su ru hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya mA ra ya mA ra ya
15b2(ji): hUM phaT/ drod dang gsher las grub pa yi// sngags brjod khro mo bzhi po bskyed// yab yum 'dod chags nga ro brjod// byin gnyis don du rab tu 'khyud// lag pa
15b3(ji): dam 'khyud ma mchu 'jig/ hUM sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku// ngang nyid rdo rje chos dbyings las// 'bar ba'i khro bo mi bzad pa// sku yi dbyug tu sras
15b4(ji): skyed cig/ de brjod bde ba'i rba rlabs kyis// yi ge 'joms byed sgra yis bskyed// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM hUM phaT/ sras mchog rdo rje phur pa ni// yum
15b5(ji): gyi b+ha gar sku gsum rdzogs// badz+ra sa ma ya dza/ de brjod yab kyi phyag gis blangs// phyag ni rigs lnga yab yum bcu// sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ bde ba'i
15b6(ji): rlabs kyi dbang bzhi bskur// oM badz+ra ki li ki la ya a be sha ka hU~M phaT/ rigs lnga dbu yi gtsug tor can// thams cad 'dus pa'i sras mchog ste// dug lnga rtsad nas
15b7(ji): gcod par byed// sangs rgyas 'dus pa thams cad kyis// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs// oM buH kI li kI la ya ka ya badz+ran na/ dz+wa la dza la/ pra dza la
16a1(ji): s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/ sarba na swa pa na ye hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma kA li ki la ya wA ka badz+ra nan sarba duSh+TA na hri sho da ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya badz+ra tsat+ta nan/
16a2(ji): tshan+na tshin+na hUM phaT/ lus kyi ba sru'i bu ga kun// khro chung nyid kyi sa rab tu ga ta mas// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya bi ta li maN+Da la rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM phaT/ lus kyi skrag dang ldan pa
16a3(ji): dang ba spu'i bu kha rdo rjes gtams// oM badz+ra ki li kI la ya ma gu ta la ta la pra ta la hUM phaT/ oM bud+d+ha thams cad 'dus pa'i sku// khro bo du mas byin gyis
16a4(ji): brlabs// khams gsum gdug pa bsgral ba'i phyir// gdul bya'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol// sa ma ya tiSh+Tha lhan/ sma yi stobs kyi yab yum gyi// sngon du
16a5(ji): bka' stod tshul du ni// khrag 'thung 'dus pa'i phur pa ni// sras kyi mchog tu rab tu dmigs// khrag 'thung 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor la// dbang ni rab tu blang bar bya//
16a6(ji): dang po bde ba'i sgra yis mchod// hUM thabs kyi spyod pa'i 'gro don du// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba// sangs rgyas 'phrin las rdzogs mdzad pa// dbang
16a7(ji): dang byin rlabs bdag gsol cig/ dbang bzhi rdzogs par rab tu blangs// oM AHhUM/ hUM hUM hUM/ 'gro drug nyon mongs bcings pa rnams// hUM gis dug chen rab sbyangs te/
16b1(ji): a nI su tri pre dur 'gyur// raM yaM khaM las me rlung chu// 'gro ba rab sbyangs hUM du 'gyur// khams gsum thams cad rdo rje sems// til gyi gang bu lta bus gang //
16b2(ji): rta mgrin rgyal po ye shes la// bstim pas byang chub sems rgyas 'gyur// yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba'i sgras// ye shes khro bo spyan drangs te// hUM srid
16b3(ji): pa'i phur bu bsgrub pa dang // dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol// khro bo chen po gshegs nas kyang // rtags dang mtshan
16b4(ji): ma bstan pa dang // rdo rje phu ra pa'i dngos grub gsol// oM badz+ra kI li ki la ya sa ma ya dza/ a ti pu ho/ pu ti dza ho/ sarba ta thA ga ta pre ta nang kha ra yo mau/ dza hUM baM ho
16b5(ji): ya ba yum bde ba'i sbyor ba las// mchod pa rnams dang 'don yon lnga// bde ba'i mchod pa rab tu brtsams// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya dzaHhUM baM ho/ sarba big+ha nan baM hUM phaT/
16b6(ji): pU dza badz+ra swa b+ha wa At+ma ko&haM/ gtor ma sa lha rnams tshim par bya// hUM mthu rtsa la dbyangs pa'i dus la ba ba// dam tshig chen po'i dus la ba ba// sprul pa chen po'i
16b7(ji): dus la bab// phyag brnyan chen po'i dus la bab// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya dza d+hU ba ho/ sarba big+h+nAn ba hU~M ts+tsha baT/ ma hA ba ling ya ba Ni/ dug gsum mchod pa rab phul bas/
17a1(ji): sangs rgyas sku gsung thob par 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga yis mchod pa yis// khro bo'i tshogs rnams mnyes par 'gyur// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya
17a2(ji): na mAHsarba ta thA ga tA ar+b+ba pra tIts+tsha hau/ shri pany+tsa a mr-i ta kha ra khA hi/ kha ra khA hi/ kha raM khA hi/ oM badz+ra ki li kI la ya/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ sarba big+h+nAn baM huM hUM phaT/ pany+tsa a
17a3(ji): mr-i ta/ kha raM khA hi/ bdud rtsi lnga yi mchod pa yis// dug chen lnga po rang dag nas// sangs rgyas lnga yi ngo bor 'gyur// oM AHhUM/ shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo las//
17a4(ji): sangs rgyas sku gsung thugs rnams 'grub// 'dod chags rab tu dag bya'i phyir// rak+ta'i mchod pa brtson par bya// hUM dngos grub bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// gdug
17a5(ji): cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// zung zhig rgyob cig rnam pa chings// rtogs shig grogs dang bral bar gyis// rings par khug la spra chug cig/ phog cig rnam par
17a6(ji): gzir bar bgyis// nga yi dbang du gyur nas kyang // bsgo ba'i bka' 'di nyan par byos// ma hA rak+ta khA hi/ hUM bran dang bka' nyan pho nyi 'tshogs// khyed kyi
17a7(ji): dam tshig dus la ba ba// sngon chad ji bzhin bcas pa yis// mngon spyod 'phrin las myur du mdzod// ma hA rak+ta la khA hi/ hUM dngos grub bar chad byed pa'i bgegs
17b1(ji): gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// lha'am 'on te bdud kyang rung // nga la bar chad byed pa rnams// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par shog/ mA hA rak+ta la khA hi
17b2(ji): lag pa khrag 'thung ya ba yum bcus// dug gsum rtsad nas gcad pa'i phyir// kham sa gsum yongs sgrol sbyor bar byas// hUM rdungs shig rdo rje 'bar ba'i gtun//
17b3(ji): bka' las 'da' byed sdig can rnams// rdo rje me dpal snying bsregs nas// lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du lhogs// khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du// rdo rje tho bas
17b4(ji): brdungs byas nas// lha yang rung ste bsgral bar gyis// kha tha/ kha tha ma/ kha tha ma/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ ha ha ha/ dpal ldan khrag 'thung 'khor
17b5(ji): bcas kyis// 'gro ba rigs drug sems can gyi// dug gsum rtsad nas bcad par 'gyur// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum// mchod dang bshags dang
17b6(ji): bstab pa bya// lhag mas mkha' 'gro mnyes par 'gyur// lhag ma rnam pa gsum yin te// dpal gyi lhag ma dang / rigs 'dzin gyi phud dang / rigs 'dzin
17b7(ji): gyi lhag ma bsres la// rang gi kha ra rak+ta dang chang blugs la/ rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya bcas la/ rang gi lce thog tu hri dzi la rta mgrin ya ba yum zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa
18a1(ji): dmar po pad+ma thod khrag can du bsam/ phyag rgya byas te gtor ma kyang de kho na 'dra bar bsam/ kha thu phyag rgya nas gtor mar btab pas
18a2(ji): lce'i rta mgrin yab yum sbyor ba byas pa'i thig le 'od du phyag rgya phog ste/ sbyor bas gtor ma 'od du zhu nas/ bdud rtsi mu tig dmar po lta bur gyur/ dam can rnams kyis gsol
18a3(ji): nas bar chod sel lo// dga' zhing spro dang bcas pa yi// gsang sngags drag po'i sngags 'di bzlas// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya hUM phaT/ yi ge dgu pa sngags kyi mchog
18a4(ji): ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ tip+ta tsakra ha na ha na ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ ya ba yum gsum gyi snying po mchog/ sdig pa thams cad zad gyur cing /
18a5(ji): sdug bsngal thams cad med par byed// gdug pa tshar gcod bdud las rgyal// bde sgrol mkha' mnyam dbyer med thob// oM badz+ra kI li kA la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ lha
18a6(ji): rnams bsdus pas nye snying ste// sems kyi sdig pas sdug bsngal sel// lha klu dbang gyur dngos grub thob// ma b+h+yo drag dza/ mkha' 'gro kun gyi srog 'phrog sngags// yi ge
18a7(ji): mtshan ma mthong ba dang // 'od me 'tshag 'khol mchod lding 'gyur// myur du lha yi zhal mthong 'gyur// dpal rdo rje gzhon nu thugs rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa las
18b1(ji): bsam gtan gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas rnam rgyal khro bo yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// gdug pa tshar gcod bcom
18b2(ji): ldan 'das// klu tshogs dbang du ji ltar bsdu// 'gro ba rigs drug ji ltar bsgral// thugs rje can gyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'
18b3(ji): stsal to// nga yis bshad kyis legs par nyon// klu dang gshin rje bdud la sogs// drag po thams cad dbang sdud na// gru gsum drag po'i gnas nyid du//
18b4(ji): dur khrod sa la dkyil 'khor ni// gru gsum mthing nag dkyil 'khor bya// sor brgyad phur pa nyi shu brgyad// dkyil 'khor rdzas su yang dag dgod// gong bzhin mngon
18b5(ji): rtogs rim pa las// bzhi bcu zhe brgyad lha tshogs kun// kun gyi spyi bo'i gtsug tor na// rta mgo ljang khu rta skad 'tsher// khams gsum klu tshogs dbang du sdus/
18b6(ji): rdo rje gshog pas par snang khebs// phyag na phur pa bya khyung bsnams// zhabs kyi chu srin phur pa dpal// klu la sogs pa'i snying khar gzer// kun kyang kha dog dmar por
18b7(ji): dmigs// gdug pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur// oM badz+ra kI li ki la ya dzaHhUM ba ho/ badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya gri ba tri/ hu lu hu lu hri/ pad+ma tri/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hri/ hUM ka ru btsa la
19a1(ji): le hri/ sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM hUM phaT phaT b+h+yo na ga b+h+yo/ zhag gsum lon nas dbang du 'gyur// klu sogs thams cad dbang du 'gyur// gang
19a2(ji): zhig pasad par 'dod pa na// drag po'i las kyi bsam gtan brtsam// lha rnams sku mdog nag por te// sngags kyang sgra dang me ru byung // gang zhig bsad par 'dod pa la// /
19a3(ji): phur pa'i ser chen rab tu ba ba sa// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya dzaHhUM baM ho/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya gri ba nA ga hu lu hu lu sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM pheT/ sbyor ba zhag bdun byas gyur na// lha klu
19a4(ji): thams cad 'ching bar 'gyur// mi dang lha dang klu la sogs// yang dag sa la bsgral 'dod na// ngang nyid rdo rje snying rje yis// bsad cing mnan pa ma yin
19a5(ji): te/ phung po rdo rje gtams byas nas// rnam shes rdo rje ting 'dzin gnas// hUM rdo rje rigs kyi lha tshogs ni// til gyi gang bu lta bu yis// rtsa bcud kun gyi rtse la 'bar/
19a6(ji): pa nyid sku yi rnam pa las// sngags kyi 'od zer du ma byung // khro rgyal khyod kyi sa mnyam par byos// de tshe de yi rjes la ni// thugs kyi dpal be'u rtse mo dang // ljags
19a7(ji): kyi pad+ma'i gling dkyil nas// ngan sngags snying po 'di byung ngo // oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya log 'dren thams cad mA ra ya/ dz+wa la pa ya dza la pa ya hUM phaT/ da yi log 'dren
19b1(ji): thams cad kun// smyos shing sba bar gyur pa yin// rdo rje rigs kyi lha tshogs kyis// smyo byed ces bya'i sngags su gsungs// bcom ldan dbu yi gtsug tor nas/
19b2(ji): oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya log 'dren thams cad mA ra ya/ ta tha ya ta tha ya hUM phaT/ snod bcud log 'dren thams cad kun// rdul phran bzhin du phye mar 'gyur// rdo rje rigs kyi lha/
19b3(ji): tshogs kyis// rdul rlog ces bya'i sngags su gsungs// bcom ldan gsang ba'i sbubs nas ni// ngan sngags snying po 'di byung ngo // oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya log 'dren
19b4(ji): thams cad ma rA ya/ bin d+ha ya bin d+ha ya hUM phaT/ log 'dren snod bcud thams cad kun// bcom ldan gsang ba'i zhal du gsol// rdo rje rigs kyi lha tshogs kyis// zhal
19b5(ji): du bstab pa'i snying por gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod pu nas// ngan sngags snying po 'di byung ngo // oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya gnod pa'i nus pa hA sa ra ya hri/ da ya
19b6(ji): hUM phaT/ ngan sngags snying po 'di byung bas// lo ka khams 'di rab tu g.yos// bdud dpung thams cad pham par 'gyur// rdo rje rigs kyi lha tshogs kyis// lha dang bral
19b7(ji): ba'i sngags su gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyi lte ba nas// dbang sdud 'gugs pa'i snying po byung // oM badz+ra kI li ki la ya log 'dren thams cad a be sha ya a~M be sha ya hUM phaT// stong
20a1(ji): gsum log 'dren thams cad kun// gzugs nas dbang sdud rdo bzhin 'gyur// rdo rje rigs kyi lha tshogs kyis// 'bebs par byed pa'i
20a2(ji): sngags su gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag zhabs las// ngan sngags snying po 'di byung ngo // oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ log 'dran tha mas cad ma ra ya shi tri a na
20a3(ji): ya hUM phaT/ bdud dang log 'dren thams cad kun// yan lag gru gu bzhin du 'gyur// rdo rje rigs kyi lha tshogs kyis// byang du gzhug pa'i sngags su gsungs// bcom
20a4(ji): ldan thugs ka'i dpal be'u nas// gsang ba'i snying po 'di phyung ngo // oM laM hUM laM staM b+ha ya nan/ mo ha ga ya b+ha ga wa na shi tri bi tri badz+ra hUM ka ra hUM hUM phaT phaT/ badz+ra ka ra a/
20a5(ji): hUM ma ma pa shi ku ru mabyu dz+nyA na gar mi nan/ d+ha ti ma ma karma pa shi karma ye shi kr-i ka ra ya hUM phaT/ 'di 'byung log 'dren thams cad kyis// rnam shes 'phos shing bde ba thob// rdorje
20a6(ji): rigs kyi lha tshogs kyis// dag cing tshe 'dzin sngags su gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyi lte ba dang // thugs ka dpung pa dpyi mig dang // gtsug tor gsang ba'i lam dang
20a7(ji): ni/ spyi bo gsang ba'i gnas rnams nas// gsang ba'i snying po 'di phyung ngo // hUM swar bis+thAn/ tshon+d+ra tshin+d+ra hU~M phaT/ bin+d+ha tshin+d+ra N+ye phaT/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM phaT/ ha na ha na hUM phaT
20b1(ji): ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ sarba A na ya hUM phaT/ ta thA ya ta tha ya hUM phaT/ 'di 'byung khro mo bcu po yis// gnas bcu nyon mongs rab dag nas// log 'dren thams cad thar pa
20b2(ji): nyid du 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyi shangs dang ni// spyan snyan lte ljags gsang sbubs dang // thugs kyi dpal be'u'i rtse mo nas// gsang ba'i snying po 'di rnams
20b3(ji): 'byung / ha na ha na badz+ra/ da ha da ha badz+ra/ pa tsa pa tsa badz+ra/ ma tha ma tha badz+ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badz+ra/ su ru su ru badz+ra/ mu ru mu ru badz+ra/ ka tang ka ye/ dza ye bi dza ye/ a
20b4(ji): tsit+ti a par tsit+te/ ma ra sa na pra ma ra ta na ya hUM phaT/ 'di 'byung rig pa'i khro bo bcus// log par 'dren pa thams cad kyis// gnas bcu'i nyon mongs rnam dag nas//
20b5(ji): thig le dbyings su mi 'gyur thim// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi bo dang // snying kha lte ba'i gnas gsum nas// o badz+ra ki la kI la ya bi da ya bi da ya hUM phaT/ na maHsa
20b6(ji): man+ta hIng hring hUM phaT/ su ru su ru pra su ru hUM ma ra ya ma ra ya hUM phaT/ de byung sgo ma bzhi po yis// mgo bzhi nyon mongs rab dag nas// dag pa'i mtshan ni nyag gcig ste/
20b7(ji): chos kyi dbyings su rnam par dag/ ngan sngags 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// gru gsum mthing nag dkyil 'khor la// rgya ni khru gang zabs su byed// kha khyer gsum la
21a1(ji): sor bzhi ste// dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi yin te// drag po me yi dkyil 'khor dang // ma ra ya bsad pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // 'grub
21a2(ji): khung las kyi dkyil 'khor dang // bstab pa zhal gyi dkyil 'khor ro// gnag pa dmar ba'i mdog 'dra ba// mthun pa'i rdzas ni tsakra gtso// sla ba klad rgyas 'khor
21a3(ji): lo ni/ lha dang dpral ba'i 'khor lo yin// pad+ma 'dab bzhi'i 'khor lo ni// gzugs la dbab pa'i 'khor lo yin// nya lta bu yi tsakra ni// byad du gzhug pa'i
21a4(ji): 'khor lo yin// parma ba dab 'dra'i tsakra ni// smyo bar byed pa'i tsakra yin// pad+ma 'dab bzhi'i tsakra ni// rdul du rlog pa'i tsakra yin// rdo rje dbyibs 'dra'i tsakra ni// zhal
21a5(ji): du bstab pa nyid du 'gyur// srog la 'khor lo bskor ba ni// rtsibs drug lte bar ling ga dgod// gtad gnan byas pas las 'grub cing // khyad par klu la gtad pas
21a6(ji): 'grub/ rdzas ni rnam pa drug yin te// gu gul tshil chen dri chen gsum// rkang drag gu gul ra yi gzhob// lha dang dpral ba'i rdzas yin te// dbab la yungs
21a7(ji): ka ra rgyal po dang // smad dkris rak+ta tsha ba yin// tshon sna lnga yi byed du gzhug/ smyo ba dug gi chu yis so// rdo rje tho bas rdul du brlag/ bstab pa me yi 'khor lo
21b1(ji): ro/ lha dang dpral bas dgug pa dang // rnam shes bstim zhing byad du gzhug/ sbyor gzhug rdul du brlag pa dang // zhal du bstab pas dgyes par 'gyur//
21b2(ji): dngos grub par chod byed pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// rtogs shig grogs dang bral bar gyis// phob cing rnam par gzir bar byos//
21b3(ji): zung zhig rgyob cig rnam par chings// ring bar khug la sgrar chug cig/ nga yi dbang du gyur nas kyang // bsgo ba'i bka' 'di nyan par byos// zhal du bsta ba po mgul du
21b4(ji): bstim sku yi gzi brjid rgyas pas mdzod// badz+ra yak+Sha kro d+ha kha thaM kha rba kha thaM/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ hA hA hA/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ phur pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad la// yang
21b5(ji): yum gsum gyi bden gnyis kyis// phyag rgya chen po'i sku ru gsung // dza tis 'gugs dang bsad pa'i mchog/ sras kyi mchog gis las rnams 'grub// khro bo yab
21b6(ji): yum bcu po yis// gnas bcu dug gsum rtsa nas gcod// sgo ba bzhi yis mtsho bzhi skems// srid pa rdo rje phur pa'i lha// ye shes khro bor rab bsgrub nas// nyon
21b7(ji): mongs dug lnga rtsa nas gcod// khrag 'thung rigs lnga 'dus pa las// rdo rje gzhon nu'i dngos grub thob// las bzhi grub pa'i smon lam gdab// gang zhig mtshon cha ma
22a1(ji): po dang / mtshon cha 'phreng ba yig 'bru dang // sgra dang me dang 'od dang 'ja'// drag byed thams cad bran du bkol// khrag mtsho
22a2(ji): rus srungs pa yi// drag byed kun tu mthong ba dang // 'od dang du ba me rnams 'byung // tshe dang mi 'phel longs spyod dang // rigs 'dzin sa dang dbyings rnams
22a3(ji): 'thob/ khams gsum yongs sgrol ting 'dzin gyis// nam mkha' chos sku nyag gcig 'thob// rdo rje gzhon nu thugs rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa las
22a4(ji): sngags drug gi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas rnam rgyal khro bo yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// 'gro ba'i mgon mdzad bcom ldan
22a5(ji): 'das/ ro yi dngos grub ji ltar lags// dur khrod spyod pa ji ltar lags// mgon mdzad khyod kyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
22a6(ji): ro bsgrub spyod pa byed pa rnams// nga yis bshad kyi legs par nyon// ro yi mtshan nyid legs par brtags// mi rigs lnga la kun tu bshad// sha chen lnga la 'di ltar ba rtag
22a7(ji): / grub rdzas dngos grub lha ru brtag/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ gshed dang dpral phyir bdud rtsi 'khyil// mchog phur sor brgyad nyid la bsgrub// gnas pa'i
22b1(ji): khung du sbyar bar 'gyur// pha rol phyin bcu dag pa yi// khro bo bcu yis sdig pa sbyangs// yi ge drug la 'gro drug sbyangs// bar chad gsal phyir bro brdungs
22b2(ji): te/ hUM/ stong gsum stong gi lo ka na// dbus phyogs stong gi lo ka nas// dregs pa bsnol ba'i gdan stengs na// rdo rje khrag 'thung bro ra 'chang // zhal gcig
22b3(ji): phyag gnyis mthing nag sgra// rdo rje dbyings phyug yum la 'gyur// rdo rje thod khrag dkrug cing gsol// dur khrod chas kyis lnga srin 'dul// rdo rje gshog pa bar snang
22b4(ji): brgyangs// spyan gsum dmar zlum stong gsum sreg/ mche ba gtsigs pas bdud bzhi 'joms// ljags dmar glog stong 'khyug pa yis// stong gsum ma
22b5(ji): lus gsal bar byed// hUM gi sgra ni 'brug bzhin sgrog/ brkyang bskum zhabs kyis bro brdungs pa// bdud ni phye mar 'thag pa'i bro// glu ni yongs su rjod pi'i' bro//
22b6(ji): bgegs rnams mer ni bsreg pa'i bro// ma bdud thal bar rlog pa'i bro// dur khro da 'di la pro brdungs pa sa// dam nyam sa gshe da ni rlag par 'gyur// o ru lu
22b7(ji): ru lu hUM b+h+yo hAM/ phyogs bzhi rigs kyi bro brdungs pas// bar chad bgegs ni skyengs par 'gyur// khro bcu rdo rje 'gros kyis blang // drag po bya yi 'gros kyis
23a1(ji): blang // mkha' 'gro lce spyang 'gros kyis blangs// bdud kyi sgo la 'ju thag gcad// sa yi rten phur 'og tu dgod// rdo rje rgya gram
23a2(ji): thag pas drag/ dkyil 'khor steng du ru dra bzhin// dur khrod gzhal yas khang du gzung // sgrub pa byed pa'i rdzas su gzung // thugs dam pa skangs pa'i bdud
23a3(ji): rtsir gzung // oM ru lu ru lu tsu b+h+yo hUM/ dur khrod gnas su byin gyis brlabs// bsgrub pa lha dang bdud rtsi lngar// byin gyis brlabs pa'i yon tan sla// hUM
23a4(ji): dbyings kyi yum chen las// mkha' 'gro mang po'i sprul pa 'gyed// kau ri ba na dmar zhing dbyug sngo// tse ri ser mo mda' gzhu 'gengs// pra mo chu sran rgyal mtshan
23a5(ji): dam ra nag sngo// pe ta nag mo zhing chung za// bu ka dmar ser rgyu zhags 'dren// b+ha swa ljang khu dung khrag 'thung // sma sha mdog na ga zhing snying za// tsaN+Da ser skya zhing
23a6(ji): lug 'bral// ma mo chen po khyed brgyad kyis// dur khrod gnas su byin gyis brlabs// he ru ka yi grong khyer mdzod// bdud rtsi lnga ru byin gyi sa brlabs// b+h+yo
23a7(ji): seng gdong ser mo ro bsnol za// stag gdong dmar mo bsnol mar lta// wa gdong nag mo ro la bldag/ khyi gdong mthing kha zur lha len// bya rgod gdong dmar rgyu ma 'dren//
23b1(ji): k+Shang ka rjo rgya ning lam// bya rog gdong nag pan gri 'dzin// 'ug gdong khra mo rgyu gram 'dzin// 'bra men rdo rje khyed brgyad kyis// ru lu bzlas shing byin gyis brlang
23b2(ji): oM ru lu ru lu d+ha N+yo ng+ku/ thugs dam bskang ba sgrub pa'i rdzas// bdud rtsi lnga sogs pa ling bskang // rten pa'i gnas kyi thugs dam bskang // ro yi sbrus
23b3(ji): spyan drangs la// hUM bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang // d+hU ti rtsa yi byang sems kyis// bla ma dam pa'i thugs dam paskang // dam tshig
23b4(ji): gnyen po bskang gyur nas// zag med bde ba rgyas gyur cig/ hUMro lus 'dom gang gru bzhi 'di// dur khrod gzhal yas khang du gsal// gru bzhi
23b5(ji): pa la kha dog lnga// dri ma nag mo bai DUr sngo// skye rnams ldang khu mar gad mdog/ tshi lu ser po gser ltar snang // rus pa dkar po shel dngul mdog
23b6(ji): lnga yi brtsig pa rab tu mdzes// skal tshigs gdung gi rang bzhin la// rkang brgyad kra ba brgyad yin no// zur ma byam lartsib ma gral// rtsa yi dra bas rab 'bral cing /
23b7(ji): mgo yi gsang sgo shel ltar dkar// mig g.yas lho sgo gser ltar ser// mig g.yon byang sgo dmar dang lcang // nub kyi tsha sgo pa da ltar dmar// 'og
24a1(ji): gi spu nag smin ma dang // skra rnams sgo yi rgyan yin no// rkang lag sen mo'i 'phreng ba rnams// mu tig dra ba phyed pas mdzes//
24a2(ji): tshig mdud rin chen pha gu la// phag la 'dod yon lha mos mdzes// dur khrod gzhal yas mdzes pa yis// dkyil 'khor lha yi thugs dam bskang // phung po lnga ni
24a3(ji): gnas gyur pa// khrag 'thung lnga yi thugs dam bskang // 'byung ba lnga yi gnas gyur pa// yum chen lnga yi thugs dam paskang // kun gzhi'i rnam shes gnas
24a4(ji): gyur pa/ rdo rje gzhon nu'i thugs dam bskang // sgo lnga'i rnam shes gnas gyur pa// e ka dza ti'i thugs dam bskang // ma mo bcu drug thugs dam bskang /
24a5(ji): yid kyi rnam shes gnas gyur pa// 'khor lo rgyas 'deb sa thugs dam pa skang // yan lag cha shas dum bu bcu// gnas gyur khro bcu'i thugs dam bskang // khro
24a6(ji): mo bcu yi thugs dam bskang // sgal tshigs nyi shus gnas gyur pas// mgo brnyan nyi shu'i thugs dam bskang // lus kyi mtsho bzhi ga nas gyur pas// sgom
24a7(ji): bzhi yi thugs dam bskang // ro la gnas pa'i bdud rtsi lngas// dkyil 'khor lnga yi thugs dam bskang // dug lnga rtsa ngan sa chod gyur cig/ ye shes lnga dang ldan
24b1(ji): gyur nas// zag med bde ba rol pa dang // sangs rgyas lhun gyis grub par shog/ thig gdab bdud rtsi bum pa dbye// oM AHhUM a mr-i ta sid+d+hi hUM hri tha/
24b2(ji): bla ma rdo rje slob dpon dang // ye shes lnga dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// ma lus pa dag la dgongs su gsol// bdag gi thog ma med pa nas// da lta yan chad sdig
24b3(ji): bgyis dang // dam tshig nyams pa 'thol lo bshags// dngos grub rnam gsum bdag la stsol// sku gsung thugs kyi dag pa dang // rdo rje gsum ni bdag la
24b4(ji): gsol/ dug lnga 'joms pa'i khrag 'thung dpal// ye shes lnga ni bdag la gsol// ting 'dzin tshe yi dngos grub dang // mngon shes lnga yi dngos grub dang //
24b5(ji): grub pa brgyad kyi dngos grub dang // 'phrin las bzhi yi dngos grub stsol// 'byor ldan longs spyod dngos grub stsol// a la la ho/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ rdo rje gsum
24b6(ji): ldan nyid du 'gyur// hUM bla ma rdo rje slob dpon dang // he ru ka sogs khrag 'thung tshogs// ma mo mkha' 'gro rten pa'i phyir// tsit+ta gsang ba'i rten du bcang /
24b7(ji): mtshan ldan rdo rje ka pA la ra// bdud rtsi lnga yi snod du bcang // lus la gnas pa'i bdud rtsi lnga// lnga rnams 'dus pa'i rdzas su bcang // phur pa'i rkang la phung
25a1(ji): ba ste/ khro bo bcu yi rten du bcang // bla yi rkang la 'bud pa'i dus// lcang lo mtshan dang ldan pa la// ma mo mkha' 'gro'i rten du
25a2(ji): bcang / lag pa g.yas pa hasta la// mkhab 'gro g.yob pa'i rten du bcang // s+pho Ta pad+ma sra bri ba'i rdzas// zhing pags g.yang gzhi ra' phyar ba yang /
25a3(ji): 'phra men nyid shu'i rten du bcang // rgyu ma'i zhags pa 'dren pa yang // ma mo bcu drug brten pa'i rdzas// dbang po rnam lnga'i me tog kyang // yab yum gsum gyi rten pa'i
25a4(ji): rdzas/ 'tsho bzhi'i dum bu 'chang ba yang // sgo ba bzhi yi rten du bzung // a la la ho/ dur khrod ro la longs spyod cing // dur khrod chas kyis rab tu brgyan//
25a5(ji): dur khrod gnas su rgyu bya zhing // bdud rtsi lnga la longs spyad nas// dur khrod mkha' 'gro gnas dang 'grogs// 'dod yon lnga la longs spyod cing // khams gsum
25a6(ji): pa yi sems can kun// bsad pas grol bar gyur pa yin// rtog med dbyings la gnas gyur na// bsad pas sdig gis ma gos shing // rigs 'dzin sa la myur
25a7(ji): du 'gro/ zag med pa de stong dbyer med la// mkha' 'gro kun dang longs spod 'gyur// dpal rdo rje gzhon nu thugs rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa las
25b1(ji): ro bsgrub pa spyod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas rnam rgyal khro bo yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// 'phrin las mdzad
25b2(ji): pa'i bcom ldan 'das// phur pas 'phrin las 'grub pa yang // 'gro ba'i don du ba shad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// phur pa rnam pa
25b3(ji): bzhi yin te// chos nyid don gyi phur pa dang // rig pa ye shes phur pa dang // 'dus byas rdzas kyi phur pa dang // rten pa lus kyi phur pa'o// 'dus byas rdzas kyi phur pa
25b4(ji): ni/ dngul lam 'o ma can gyi shing // zangs sa ma tsan dan dmar po'i shing // lcags dang rkang dang tsher me'i shing // gser rama'o se ser po'i shing // sor brgyad
25b5(ji): sor drug bcu gnyis dang // bcu drug phur pa'i tshad yin no// zlu ma dang gru bzhi zla gam dang // phur gsum dbyibs su nges pa yin// gcig dang lha grangs mnyam pa'o// /
25b6(ji): maN+Da la dbyibs dang kha dog nyid// gzungs thag kha dog bzhi dang ldan// gtor ma'i rigs su nges pa yin// bzlas pa dngos grub myur du thob// shAn+ting ku ru swA hA/
25b7(ji): puSh+TiM ku ru oM/ wa shang ku ru ho/ ma ra ya phaT/ ling gnyid la mngon par bsgrub// bdun 'bum grangs kyis 'grub par 'gyur// 'gul dang 'phrog dang 'tsheg pa 'byung //
26a1(ji): grub nas so so'i las la sbyar// dgra dang bgegs dang nad zhi dang // tshe dang longs spyod rgyas par 'gyur// 'di nas phyi mar bsgral
26a2(ji): ba dang / bla med lnga ru bskal ba'i phyir// 'di bskal bsod nams dpag tu med// rdo rje 'dzin pa kum ra'i// dngos grub thams cad myur du 'grub// dpal
26a3(ji): rdo rje gzhon nu thugs rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa las// phur pas 'phrin las bzhi 'grub pa ste le'u bdun pa'o// / de nas rnam rgyal khro
26a4(ji): yis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// thugs rje byams mgon bcom ldan 'das// tshe yi rigs 'dzin ji ltar sgrub// sgrub pa'i dngos grub ji ltar blang //
26a5(ji): mgon mdzad khyod kyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de yang 'grub pa'i dngos grub ni// nga yis bshad kyis
26a6(ji): legs par nyon// tshe ni rnam pa gsum yin te// mi 'gyur mi 'phrog rdo rje'i tshe// nyams shing 'pho ba thig le'i tshe// 'khrul zhing rtog pa snang ba'i tshe// nyams
26a7(ji): shing 'pho ba tshe'i rang bzhin// nyams pa'i rgyu ni 'di lta ste// dam nyams bzhin 'gyur spyod lam nyams// dam can 'khrugs shing sems 'khrugs dang // zhe
26b1(ji): sdang rgyas dang bgegs dang phrad// dred dang ngas spod gtong kha ra rbad dang // dam can gtor chag tshe nyams 'gyur// bla ma la gus rgyud la sbyangs// ting 'dzin brten
26b2(ji): zhing rig sngags 'dzin// dam can nye bar 'gyur ba yin// 'a di yi sa tshe ni khugs 'gyur te// nyams pa gso bar 'dod pa yis// bkra shis sa la maN+Dal bya//
26b3(ji): pad+ma 'khor lo rgya gram ldan// lha yi rten ni mar me dgu// khro bo bcu'i phur pas bgegs gsal zhing // bdud rtsi lnga dang sman lnga dang // phung po rten pa'i
26b4(ji): zas mchog las// thod pa lcags dang rin chen snod// bum pa yid 'ong mdzes pa ru// bsgrub pa'i tshe ni rab tu 'phel// bud+d+ha kun gyis byin gyis rlo ba//
26b5(ji): oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ A yur+dz+nyA na A kaR+Sha ya dza/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ oM AHhUM/ tshe ni rigs lnga khrag 'thung ste// dug lnga ye shes lnga rang bzhin/
26b6(ji): thig le mi shigs ngo bo nyid// gdod nas ma skyes ngo bo la// rang bzhin dag pas rin chen 'dra// hUM dbus nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// dpal chen rdo rje khrag
26b7(ji): 'thung dang // khro mo rdo rje dbyings phyug ma// mthing nag mi 'gyur nam mkha'i mdog/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis khro mo'i tshul// rdo rjes gdug pa 'dul mdzad cing //
27a1(ji): bai nuR+Ya yi bum pa g.yon// nang na 'chi med bdud rtsis bkang // ka shi dar gyis mgul bcings shing // dpag bsam ljon
27a2(ji): pas khwa brgyan nas// ya ba yum bde ba'i sbyor ba las// byang sems mu tig khu 'phangs 'bebs// rdo rje khrag 'thung dpag med kyis// stong gsum
27a3(ji): stong gi 'jig rten bkang // zhal nas tshe yi sngags zlos shing // lha klu gnod sbyin gshin rje dang // mkha' 'gro'i lag nas tshwa khug cig/ drongs shig drongs
27a4(ji): shig tshe drongs shig/ tshe bu ma 'di la byin gyis rlobs// tshe bum 'di la rtags phyung zhig/ rigs 'dzin bsgrub pa'i tshe spel cig/ sku gsung thugs kyi
27a5(ji): dngos grub stso la// oM ru lu ru lu hU~M dz+yoH/ a yur+dz+nyA na niHr+m+ma hUM/ sha ra nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// dpal chen bde gshegs khrag 'thung ste// khro mo sangs rgyas dbyings phyug ma/
27a6(ji): sku mdog shel ltar dkar gsal zhing // zhal gcig phyag gnyis khro mo'i sku// 'khor los bdud bzhi 'joms par mdzad// g.yon na shel gyi bum pa
27a7(ji): bsnams// nang na 'chi med bdud rtsis bkang // ka shi dar gyis mgul bcings la// dpag bsam ljon pas kha brgyan nas// yab yum bde bas sbyor ba
27b1(ji): las/ byang sems mu tig khu 'phangs 'bebs// bud+d+ha khrag 'thung dpag med kyis// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten bkang // zhal nas tshe yi sngags zlos
27b2(ji): shing / lha klu gnod sbyin gshin rje dang // mkha' 'gro'i lag nas tshe khug cig/ drongs shig drongs shig tshe drongs shig/ tshe bum 'di la byin gyis rlobs//
27b3(ji): tshe bum 'di la rtags phyung zhig/ rigs 'dzin bsgrub po'i tshe sel cig/ sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub gsol// oM ru lu ru lu rmA b+h+yo d+hI/ oM ludz+nyA na tsa~Mt+tAdz+dza/
27b4(ji): hUM lho nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// dpal ldan rin chen khrag 'thung dang // khro mo rin chen dbyings phyug ma// sku mdog ser 'od rgyas mdzad cing // zhal gcig
27b5(ji): phyag gnyis khro mo'i sku// rin chen dgos 'dod re ba skong // g.yon pa gser gyi bum pa bsnams// nang na 'chi med bdud rtsis bkang // ka shi dar gyis
27b6(ji): mgul bcings la// dpag bsam ljon pas kha brgyan nas// yab yum bde ba'i sbyor ba las// byang sems mu tig khu 'a phangs 'be bas// rin chen khrag 'thung
27b7(ji): dpag med kyis// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten bkang // zhal nas tshe yi sngags zlos shing // lha klu gnod sbyin gshin rje dang // mkha' 'gro'i lag nas tshe khug
28a1(ji): cig/ drongs shig drongs shig tshe drongs shig/ tshe bum 'di la byin gyis rlobs// tshe bum 'di la rtags cig phyung // rigs 'dzin
28a2(ji): bsgrub pa po'i tshe spel cig/ sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ A yur+dz+dza na tsit+tan+tu/ hUM/ nu ba nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// dpal ldan
28a3(ji): pad+ma khrag 'thung dang // khro mo pad+ma dbyings phyug ma// sku mdog dmar gsal dbang du byed// zhal gcig phyag gnyis khro mo'i tshul// pad+ma nyon mongs chags pa sel//
28a4(ji): pad+ma rA ga'i bum pa g.yon// nang na 'chi med bdud rtsis bkang // ka shi dar gyis mgul bcings la// dpag pasam ljon pas kha brgyan nas// yab yum bde ba'i
28a5(ji): sbyor ba las// byang sem sa mu tig khu 'a phangs 'bebs// pad+ma khrag 'thung dpag med kyis// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten bkang // zhal nas tshe yi sngags
28a6(ji): zlos shing // lha klu gnod sbyin gshin rje dang // mkha' 'gro'i lag nas tshe khug cig/ drongs shig drongs tshe drongs shig/ tshe bum 'di la byin gyis rlobs//
28a7(ji): tshe bum 'di la rtags cig phyung // rigs 'dzin bsgrub pa po'i tshe spel cig/ sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ A yur+dz+dza na tsit+ta b+hU
28b1(ji): byang nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// dpal ldan las kyi khrag 'thung dang // khro mo las kyi dbyings phyug ma// lda bu 'phrin las sna tshogs 'grub// rgya
28b2(ji): gram phrag dog sdug bsngal sel// in+d+ra nI li'i bum pa bsnams// nang na 'chi me dra bdud rtsis bkang // ka shi dar gyis mgul bcings la// dpag
28b3(ji): bsam ldon pas kha brgyan nas// yab yum bde ba'i sbyor ba las// byang sems mu tig khu 'phangs 'bebs// las kyi khrag 'thung dpag med kyis// stong
28b4(ji): gsum stong gi 'jig rten bkang // zhal nas tshe yi sngags zlos shing // lha klu gnod sbyin gshin rje dang // mkha' 'gro'i lag nas tshe khug cig/ drongs shig drongs
28b5(ji): shig tshe drongs shig/ tsha bum 'di la byin gyis rlobs// tshe bum 'di la rtags phyung zhig/ rigs 'dzin bsgrub po'i tshe spel cig/ sku gsung thugs kyi dngos
28b6(ji): grub stso la// oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ A yur+dz+dza na tsit+ta b+hU/ hUM dbus nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// dpal tshon rdo rje gzhon nu ni// zhal gsum phyag drug zhab sa
28b7(ji): bzhi pagrad// gar dgu'i rol pas gnas mdzad cing // 'khor lo rgyas 'debs yum la 'khyud// yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba'i sras// dus gsum bud d+ha
29a1(ji): rab mchod nas// byang chub sems kyi thig le ni// mu tig khu 'phangs dbab tu gsol// tshe bum 'di la byin gyis rlobs// tshe bum 'di la rtags
29a2(ji): cig phyung // rigs 'dzin pa sgrub pa po la tshe spel cig/ sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// oM badz+ra kI lI kI la ya/ dzaHhUM baM hoHA yur+dz+dza na A kaR+Sha dza/ oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/
29a3(ji): / oM AHhUM/ sgrol yum e ka tsa ti ma// chos kyi dbyings kyi mkha' 'gro yum// khrag 'thung lha tshogs mnyes byed ma// bud d+ha kun dang mnyam sbyor la// bde 'od nyi ma'i gzi brjid
29a4(ji): kyis/ mkha' 'gro thams cad bsdus dbang nas// byang chub sems kyi thig le ni// mu tig khu 'phangs dbab tu gsol// tshe bum 'di la byin gyis rlobs//
29a5(ji): tshe bu ma 'di la rtags cig phyung // rigs 'dzin bsgrub pa po'i tshe spel cig/ sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ A yur+dz+dza na dzaH/ rdo rje
29a6(ji): ma mo kau ri ma// g.yas na zhing dbyug thod khrag mthing // rdo rje ma mo tse rim// ser mo phyag gnyis mda' gzhu 'gengs// rdo rje ma mo pra mo ha// chu srin rgyal mtshan
29a7(ji): thod khrag dmar// rdo rje ma mo pe ta li// g.yas na rdo rje zhing dbyug mthing // rdo rje ma mo puk+ka si// dmar ser zhing bcu rgyu ma 'dren// rdo rje ma mo b+hasma hri// ljang khu
29b1(ji): rdo rje thod khrag thogs// rdo rje ma mo sma sha ni// phyag gnyis ro 'dzin snying za mthing // rdo rje ma mo tsaN+Da li// ser skya ro 'dzin mgo lus 'brel// ma mo chen mo khyed
29b2(ji): brgyad ni// sprul pa sa ma mo stong khams 'gengs// thugs kham mo'i dpal be'u nas// byang chub sems kyi tshe 'dzin ma// khug cig drongs shig tshe drongs shig
29b3(ji): tshe bum 'di la byin gyis rlobs// tshe bum 'di la rtags cig phyung // rigs 'dzin bsgrub pa po'i tshe spel cig/ sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// rtags dang mtshan
29b4(ji): ma dbyung du gsol// oM badz+ra kau ri ha/ oM badz+ra tsau ri ha/ badz+ra pra mo ha/ badz+ra be ta li ha/ badz+ra puk+ka si ha/ badz+ra g+hasma hri ha/ badz+ra sma sha ni ha/ badz+ra tsaN+Da li ha/ oM ru
29b5(ji): lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ A yur+dz+dza na aM ku sha dza/ b+h+yo rdo rje 'bra men seng gdong ma// phyag gnyis kha yi ro 'dzin ser// rdo rje 'phra me na stag gdong ma// phyag gnyis bsnol
29b6(ji): zhing mnan nas ro la lta// rdo rje 'phra men wa gdong ma// dmar nag ro snying chung nas ldeg/ rdo rje 'phra men khyi gdong ma// ro yi khog 'byed nang blta mthing // rdo rje 'phra men bya
29b7(ji): rgod gdong // dmar ser rgyu za gri thod bsnams// rdo rje 'phra men kang ka gdong // smug nag zhing 'dzin phrag la bkal// rdo rje 'phra men bya rog gdong // nag mo ro 'dzin gri
30a1(ji): thod bsnams// rdo rje 'phra men 'ug pa'i gdong // ljang khu lcags kyu thod khrag bsnams// rdo rje 'phra men khyed brgyad ni// sprul pa dpag med
30a2(ji): stong khams 'gengs// thugs kha dpal be'u dkyil 'khor nas// byang sems thig le khu 'phangs 'bebs// khrug cig khug cig tshe khug cig/ drongs shig drongs shig
30a3(ji): chotshe drongs shig/ tshe bram 'di la byin gyis rlobs// tshe bum 'di la rtags cig phyung // oM si ha mu kha he/ oM badz+ra bya kri mu kha he/ oM badz+ra sri la mu kha he/ oM badz+ra sha na/
30a4(ji): mubadz+ra ki ta mu la / dz+ra kAng ka mra la he/ badz+ra N+Da lu mya la/ oM badz+ra kA ka mA la ts+tshe/ oM ru wa rba war+thAts+tshaH/ A mrar+dz+nyAn akra sh+tha b+ha ga dbyings kyi
30a5(ji): dkyil 'khor nas// sras mchog rdo rje phur pa ste// bud+d+ha kun gyi thugs kyi sras// khro bo'i tshul ston gdug pa 'dul// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten 'dir// sprul pa
30a6(ji): grangs med khro tshogs kyis// dgra bgegs gdug pa dbyings su sgrol// mkha' mnyam bde chen dbyings su chug/ byang sems thig le me shig dbus// mu tig khu 'phangs
30a7(ji): dbab tu gsol// tshe bum 'di la byin gyis rlobs// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya sarba bi g+ha nAn baM hUM hUM phaT/ hUM steng nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// rdo rje khro bo hU~M mdzad ni// ya
30b1(ji): yum khra thabs dpag med kyang // mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis te// bgegs chen 'dul zhing khro tshul ston// g.yas na lcags kyu phur pa bsnams// g.yon na bdud
30b2(ji): rtsi bum pa bsnams// thugs kha'i nyi zla kha sbyor nas// tshe 'dzin thugs kyi dpal be'u nas// byang sems thig le khu 'phangs 'bebs// khug cig khug cig tshe khug cig/ drongs shig/
30b3(ji): drongs shig tshe rmongs shig/ lha yi gnas nas tshe khug cig/ tshe bum 'di la byin gyis rlobs// oM badz+ra kro d+ha d+h+r-i ka ra hUM/ gardza ga rdza hUM phaT/ A yur+dz+dza na dza/ shar nas
30b4(ji): rang byung grub pa'i lha// rdo rje khro bo rnam par rgyal// yab yum khra thabs dpag med kyang // mthing na gzhal gcig phyag gnyis te// bgegs chen 'joms shing khro tshul
30b5(ji): ston/ g.yas na lcags kyu phu ra pa bsnams// g.yon na bdud rtsi bum pa bsnams// thugs kha'i nyi zla kha sbyor nas// tshe 'dzin thugs kyi dpal be'u nas// byang sems
30b6(ji): thig le khru 'phangs 'bebs// khug cig khug cig tshe khu gcig/ drongs shig drongs shig tshe drongs shig/ dri za'i lag nas tshe lug cig/ tshe bum 'di la byin gyis rlobs//
30b7(ji): oM badz+ra kro d+ha bi dza ya hUM/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ A yur+dz+dza na dza/ hUM/ shar lho mtshams nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// rdo rje khro bo dbyug sngon can// yab yum khra thabs dpag med kyang /
31a1(ji): mthing na gzhal gcig phyag gnyis te// bgegs chen 'dul zhing lo tshul ston// g.yas pa lcags kyu phur pa bsnams// g.yon pa bdud rtsi
31a2(ji): bum pa bsnams// thugs kha'i nyi zla kha sbyor nas// tshe 'dzin thugs kha'i dpal be'u nas// byang sems thig le khu 'phangs 'bebs// khug cig khug cig tshe khug cig
31a3(ji): / drongs shig drongs shig tshe drongs shig/ me lha'i lag nas tshe khug cig/ tshe bum 'di la byin gyis rlobs// oM badz+ra kro d+ha nI la dan+ta hUM/ da ha da ha hUM phaT/ A yur+dz+dza na dza/
31a4(ji): hUM lho nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// rdo rje khro bo gshin rje gshed// yab yum khra thabs dpag med kyang // mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis te// bgegs chen 'dul
31a5(ji): zhing khro tshul ston// g.yas pa lcags kyu phur pa bsnams// g.yon na bdud rtsi bum pa bsnams// thugs kyi nyi zla kha sbyor nas// tshe 'dzin thugs kyi dpal be'u nas//
31a6(ji): byabyung sems thig le khu 'phangs 'bebs// khrug cig khug cig tshe lug cig/ drongs shig drongs shig tshe drongs shig/ gshin rje'i lag nas tshe khug cig/ tshe bum 'di la
31a7(ji): byin gyis rlobs// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ A yur+dz+dza na dzaH/ hUM lho nub mtshams nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// rdo rje khro bo mi g.yo mgon/
31b1(ji): yab yu ma khra thabs dpag med kyang // mthing na ga zhal gcig phyag gnyis te// bgegs chen 'dul zhing khro tshul ston// g.yas na lcags kyu phur pa bsnams// g.yon
31b2(ji): na bdud rtsi bum pa bsnams// thugs kha'i nyi zla kha sbyor nas// tshe 'dzin thugs kyi dpal be'u nas// byang sems thig le khu 'phangs 'be bas// khu ga cig khug cig tshe
31b3(ji): khukhrugacig/ drongs shig drongs shig tshe drongs shig/ srin po'i lag nas tshe khu ga cig/ tshe bum 'di la byin gyis rlobs// oM badz+ra ar+ya a tsa la hUM/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha b+h+rUM phaT
31b4(ji): A yu dz+nyA na dzaH/ hUM nub nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// rdo rje khro bo rta mgrin dpal// yab yum khra thabs dpag med kyang // mthing na gzhal gcig phyag gnyis te/
31b5(ji): bgegs chen 'dul zhing khro tshul ston// g.yas na lcags kyu phur pa bsnams// g.yon na bdud rtsi bum pa bsnams// thugs kyi nyi zla kha sbyor nas// tshe 'dzin
31b6(ji): thugs kyi dpal be'u nas// byang sems thig le khu ba phangs 'bebs// khu ga cig khug cig tshe khug cig/ drongs shig drongs shig tshe drongs shig/ klu yi lag nas tshe khug
31b7(ji): cig/ tshe bum 'di la byin gyis rlobs// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya gri ba hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ A yur+dz+nyA na dza/ hUM nub byang mtshams nas rang byung grub pa'i lha/
32a1(ji): rdo rje khro bo gzhan mi thug/ yab yum khra thabs dpag med kyang // mthing na gzhal gcig phyag gnyis te// bgegs chen 'dul zhing khro
32a2(ji): tshul ston// g.yas na lcags kyu phur pa bsdams// g.yon na bdud rtsi bum pa bsnams// thugs kha'i nyi khra la sbyor nas// tshe 'dzin thugs kyi dpal be'u nas//
32a3(ji): byang sems thig le khu 'phangs 'bebs// khrug cig khru ga cig tshe khrag cig/ drongs shig drongs shig tshe drongs shig/ rlung lha'i lag nas tshe khug cig/ tshe bum 'di la
32a4(ji): byin gyis rlobs// oM badz+ra kro d+ha a pa ra tsat+tin+tu/ tiSh+Tha tISh+Tha hUM phaT/ A yur+dz+dza na dza/ hUM/ byang nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// rdo rje khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil// yab yum
32a5(ji): khwakhra thabs dpag med kyang // mthing na gzhal gcig phyag gnyis te// bgegs chen 'dul zhing khro tshul ston// g.yas na lcags kyu phur pa bsnams// g.yon na bdud rtsi

32b1(ji): na dzaH/ hUM/ byang shur mtshams nas rang byung grub pa'i lha// rdo rje khro bo khams gsum rgyal// yab yum khra thabs dpag med kyang // mthing nag zhal gcig
32b2(ji): phyag gnyis te// ba gags chen 'dal zhing khro tshul ston// g.yas na lcags kyu phur pa bsnams// g.yon na ba dud rtsi bum pa bsnams// thugs kha'i nyi zla kha sbyor nas//

33b7(ji): rdzogs mdzad pa// dbang dang byin rlabs bdag gsol cig/ hUM khrag 'thung lha yi dbang bskur bas// nyon mongs dug lnga rab dag nas// ye shes lnga rdzogs
34a1(ji): thig le rgyas// 'chi med tshe yi rigs 'dzin thob// oM badz+ra kI li kI la la dzaHhUM baM ho/ badz+ra shri he ru ka badz+ra kro d+hi sha ri staM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa

39b1(ji): sreg ste// khro bo rgyal po gzhon nu yis// khro bo rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyang // dpag tu med cing brjod du med// yab yum sras su snang ba yang // chos kyi

39b3(ji): nyid thob 'gyur// dpal rdo rje khros pa rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa las/ sbyin sreg gi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas rnam rgyal khro bo
39b4(ji): yis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// e ma ho bcom ldan dngos grub stso la// bde chen sras kyi dngos grub rnams// grub pa'i thabs ni ji ltar
39b5(ji): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// thun mong dngos grub thams cad kun// nga yis bshad kyis legs par nyon// phur pa lha yi dkyil
39b6(ji): 'khor kyang // thugs kyi rten las yang dag grub// de yi rgyu yang rnam pa gnyis// lcags dang shing gi bye brag go// lcags ni rnam lngas 'dus pa yin//
39b7(ji): spu gri srog rtsa gcod pa'i lcags// gnam lcags rdur mo thog gi lcags// khab len dbang sdud rgyal po la// lha dang bral ba sgo yi lcags// mnyen la lcags
40a1(ji): pa rno ba'i lcags// dge slong shan pa dge bsnyen dang // rnal 'byor rig sngags 'chang dang ni// lha bzlos blangs pa mchog yin no//
40a2(ji): zhe gnag khrims gtsang sdom ldan pa// dbang thob dad pa ldan pas brdungs// gdug pa'i shing ni rnam mang yang // rdo rje rigs kyis byin brlabs pa'i// chu 'gram
40a3(ji): brag ri sa las skyes// ljang nag dkar ser dmar ba ni// las bzhi 'grub pa'i phur pa ste// tshar ma can la bug pa khrag sha bskams// rus pas dug gsum
40a4(ji): 'joms// mtshan ldan drag po'i phyogs las blangs// bzo mkhas yon tan ldan pas bya'o// shing lcags gnyis ni tshad dang dbyibs// sor brgyad tshad du
40a5(ji): rdzogs pa la// dbu yi rgya mdud sor gcig ste// zur gsum brgyad dang gru bzhi lnga// hUM mdzad khrag 'thung lnga rdzogs te// sor gnyis lte ba yan chad la//

40a7(ji): nyid do// sor gcig btsos po mtshan ma ste// chu srin kha ru yang dag rdzogs// drag po mkha' gad pa'i/ rgya mdung/ 'gro'i dkyil 'khor yin// sor gsum dpal stob wu kar/
40a8(ji): chu srin/
40b1(ji): dang ldan pa ste// yum chen lnga yi dkyil 'khor yin// bcu gnyis ldan na dbus de gtsos// sor de ring zhing sku stod la// sor gsum ldan pa rdzogs par byas//

40b3(ji): lte ba gnyis la mtshan ma gnyis// drug ni sbal du rdzogs pa yin// chag tshad ldan pas rtags myur ro// rab gnas rtse gcig yid kyis rdzogs// rang gi lus nyid phur pa ste//
40b4(ji): mgo bo rgya mdud gong ma yin// sku stod cung zhog brgyad yin no// lte ba rgya mdud 'og ma yin// rtsos po mtshan ma chu srin kha// rkang pa gnyis ni dpal du shes// lus kyi nang
40b5(ji): du lha rdzogs pas// phur pa gcig tu bsgrubs pa yis// las rnams 'grub par the tshom med// tshon sna lnga'am pa su tas// gzungs thag ldan la bzlas pa ni// bye ba
40b6(ji): gcig gis lding bar 'gyur// 'khrol ba me dang 'od rnams 'byung // de yis las rnams thams cad 'grub// mtshan ldan rdo rje ka pA lar// dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chen//
40b7(ji): rigs lnga khrag 'thung yab yum rdzogs// bsam gtan rdzogs nas bzlog pa ni// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mra ta hri tha swA hA/ 'bum phrag gsum bzlas du ba dri// 'od rnams byung
41a1(ji): na grub pa ste// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya dzaHhUM baM ho/ ma b+h+yo drag dza sarba big+h+nAn paM hUM hUM phaTaH/ badz+ra a mr-i ta hUM hri tha/ 'bum phrag gcig gis bzlas pas 'grub
41a2(ji): 'od 'da' khol dang me byung rtags// oM ru lu ru lu hU~M n+yo hU~M/ lha rnams kun gyi snying po'i mchog// mkha' 'gro glan gyi srog snying yin// bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i gsang
41a3(ji): sngags te// yang dag don gyi lta ba'o// grub na las brgyad bsgrub par bya'o// bdud rtsi ril bu ljags su dril// khar bcug lag na phur pa thogs// gzhan
41a4(ji): gyis mi mthong gnas su phyin// yang dag pa yi don la spyod// sman de gang gi mig la bskus// gzhan gyis mi mthong lha srin mthong // rgyu ma lta bu'i sid+d+hi rdzogs//

41a7(ji): 'gyur/ ril bu de nyid rkang la bskus// phur pa lag na thogs gyur nas// nam mkha' nyid la 'phur bar 'gyur// ril bu de nyid rtag tu zos// nad rnams 'joms
41b1(ji): shing bgegs med 'gyur// bde chen nyid la longs spyod cing // bdag gzhan bde bas khyab par 'gyur// phur pa thogs shing ril bu la// A yur+d+ha na 'bum bzlas na//
